actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for adequate reserves of certain agricultural commodities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to set specified loan levels for crop reserves based upon established prices for crops, including those of corn and wheat, under his authority granted by the Agricultural Act of 1949 and the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to provide for adequate reserves of certain agricultural commodities, and for other purposes.
